   sphinx-quickstart on Wed Jun 17 11:14:39 2020.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

MitreCVE documentation
====================================
Get all CVE corresponding to a specific keyword or list of keywords - Packages or products for example - 
from the mitre website.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Table of Contents
   :name: mastertoc
   :hidden:

   ./installation
   ./examples
   ./api


:doc:`Installation / Upgrading <./installation>`
   Instructions on how to get the distribution and upgrade it.

:doc:`CLI Examples <examples>`
   Examples of how to perform specific tasks with the CLI

:doc:`API Documentation <api>` 
   The complete API documentation, organized by module.
